titleText: You are not alone, and you have options! Choose a path to explore.

options.title: College
options.hoverText: Having a college degree increases your average yearly income by 70 percent

options.title: Military
options.hoverText: The military offers many benefits after a certain time frame of service. It is a large commitment

options.title: Work Force
options.hoverText: These jobs have minimal educational requirements, and can range in pay starting at minimum wage

options.title: Technical School
options.hoverText: This is an option to learn a trade or specific skill. They range in time periods, but offer a very direct path to job options
